message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. Given its value, I believe a starting price of $11,500 is fair. What do you think?
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10,500. I'm willing to pay a premium for this product, but I need to stay within my budget.
Bob, I understand your position, but $10,500 is cutting it a bit too close to my bottom line.  How about we meet in the middle at $11,000?
I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, but I'm still a bit short on budget. Would you be willing to consider $10,800?
